text: Alam Tara 'Anna Allaha Ya`lamu Ma Fi As-Samawati Wa Ma Fi Al-'ArÄ‘i Ma Yakunu Min Najwa Thalathatin 'Illa Huwa Rabi`uhum Wa La Khamsatin 'Illa Huwa Sadisuhum Wa La 'Adna Min Dhalika Wa La 'Akthara 'Illa Huwa Ma`ahum 'Ayna Ma Kanu Thumma Yunabbi'uhum Bima `Amilu Yawma Al-Qiyamati 'Inna Allaha Bikulli Shay'in `Alimun
